titles.title: A bill to terminate the $1 presidential coin program.
A bill to terminate the $1 presidential coin program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Terminates the program for redesign and issuance of circulating $1 coins honoring each of the Presidents of the United States (Presidential $1 Coin Program).
